about_the_game:
If you want to support the developers, get this supporter pack with extra exclusive goodies! A digital artbook and the game's OST that gets your heart pumping, all at a discount!

Digital artbook:


Wanna know more about the dungeon and its inhabitants? This compilation includes the background of the characters, a bestiary of the dungeon, the dungeon's secrets, and more! All supported with the 2D assets created for the game, as well as with some renders and early sketches!

In-game Soundtrack:


9 music tracks to evoke the fairy tale atmosphere of Tower Princess, created by the amazing Landon Walter!

  • In All Her Majesty
  • The Entry Hall
  • Castle Theme
  • Enemy is Near
  • The Pig that Cooks
  • Outside the Walls
  • These Grounds Are Not Safe
  • No Room For Rushroom
  • Fight For The Lady

For your information: included content does not interfere in the game's gameplay of any sort.

Wanna know more about the dungeon and its inhabitants? This compilation includes the background of the characters, a bestiary of the dungeon, the dungeon's secrets, and more! All supported with the 2D assets created for the game, as well as with some renders and early sketches!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Lion (OSX 10.7.X)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

name: Tower Princess - Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+ / 8.1 / 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI 7770, Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Additional content for Tower Princess: a digital artbook and the game's OST. Does not include the base game.
